entry.title: the $100 kitchen
entry.content:
What would you buy if you had to start from scratch and had $100? $50? $20?

Let’s find out.

I’ll be sharing recipes you can make with the simplest of tools and equipment. I’ll assume you have a stove and oven, but nothing else. I’m going to break down the recipes based on what you need to cook them - what I’m calling the Level 1-4 Kitchens. Each level can be obtained for less than $25 at local stores, with a total price of under $100, so you can build up your kitchen slowly if you don’t have much to spare, while still eating well.

This’ll be fun!
